mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_act_hist.select */ SELECT stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ ,stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,act_cd /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */ ,act_tcnt_mcnt /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */ ,rpet_act_cnt /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */ ,cal_csum_qty /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */ ,judg_no /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_dd_act_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND act_cd = #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_act_hist.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_dd_act_hist ( stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ ,stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,act_cd /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */ ,act_tcnt_mcnt /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */ ,rpet_act_cnt /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */ ,cal_csum_qty /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */
,judg_no /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{actTcntMcnt} /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */ ,#{rpetActCnt} /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */ ,#{calCsumQty} /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */
,#{judgNo} /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_act_hist.update */ UPDATE ts_dd_act_hist
,act_tcnt_mcnt = #{actTcntMcnt} /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */
,rpet_act_cnt = #{rpetActCnt} /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */
,cal_csum_qty = #{calCsumQty} /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */
,judg_no = #{judgNo} /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND act_cd = #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_act_hist.merge */ INSERT INTO ts_dd_act_hist ( stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ act_cd /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */ ,act_tcnt_mcnt /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */ ,rpet_act_cnt /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */ ,cal_csum_qty /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */
,judg_no /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{actTcntMcnt} /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */ ,#{rpetActCnt} /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */ ,#{calCsumQty} /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */
,#{judgNo} /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,act_tcnt_mcnt = #{actTcntMcnt} /* act_tcnt_mcnt 활동_시간_분수 numeric */
,rpet_act_cnt = #{rpetActCnt} /* rpet_act_cnt 반복_활동_수 numeric */
,cal_csum_qty = #{calCsumQty} /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */

,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_act_hist.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_dd_act_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 numeric */ AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND act_cd = #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */
